meanings.sent1: The gouk always made silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a gouk and listen to bad advice.
meanings.sent3: The class clown pretended to be a gouk for laughs.
meanings.sent4: His actions made him the gouk of the group.
meanings.sent5: Being a gouk is not something to be proud of.

meanings.definition: To stare in a stupid or rude manner.
meanings.sent1: She would gouk at strangers without realizing it.
meanings.sent2: Please don't gouk at people, it's impolite.
meanings.sent3: The cat would gouk at the birds outside the window.
meanings.sent4: His intense gouking made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The child would gouk at the painting with curiosity.

meanings.sent1: He tried to gouk his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent2: It's not right to gouk others for personal gain.
meanings.sent3: The magician would gouk the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: She felt betrayed when she realized he gouked her.
meanings.sent5: The scammer would gouk innocent people out of their money.
